Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Ricoh Business Zone provides cabins with workstations at flexible time period according to the requirement of the customer, we also provide the Conference Rooms with Video Conference facility with connectivity through both IP as well as ISDN to anywhere in the world.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: It is easily accessible through frequent trains, buses or taxi. Apeejay Business Centre with its best in class amenities, highly trained support staff, unparalleled service, empowers your business to grow, the way you always envisioned.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Multiple co-working spaces available in a prime location at Apeejay House

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The Capital of West Bengal, Kolkata enjoys the presence of top IT and software companies in its prime location Sector - V. With the state receiving an overwhelming foreign direct investment in software and electronics, sector- V has metamorphosed into a premium IT hub fueling the country’s technology growth. The Apeejay Business Centre, Sector-V, Kolkata is housed in the heart of this street, making it a desired location for those who look for niche services, visibility and accessibility. With easy access to the Netaji Subhash Chandra Bose International airport and a 5 mins walking distance from upcoming East-West Metro station, this Apeejay Business Centre boasts of its most advanced infrastructure and technology, designed to increase productivity, incubate business dreams, and propel growth. In keeping with today’s mantra of fitness and well-being, ABC Kolkata also offers enrolment facilities in the gym, club and swimming pool at The ALTAIR on a membership basis. The premium ABC, Sector V Kolkata has all your workspace needs covered. It makes sense to make the prestigious Apeejay Business Centre, Park Street, Kolkata your signature address.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Multiple co-working spaces available in a prime location at Ecocentre

We have also ventured into several other spheres of the most dynamic business of infrastructure which not only develops the economy but also builds society at large.
With such a humble mission we drive each of us each day to move on and realise such potentials.
